name: Goop Tunes
description:
This game was made in under 44 hours for the 2017 Global Game Jam.

Made by Mike Thomas and Steve Gabry of Wither Studios and Portable Moose.

After being stranded on an alien planet, you must learn to communicate with the local creatures in order to ensure a safe return home. Watch and listen to the sounds they make and attempt to harness their language.

Use different combinations of notes to effect the aliens emotional state. Precious chemicals are secreted from these creatures when their emotions become extreme. These chemicals are used to refuel your ship.
